page.title: 19Gloucester's Stuntman.
page.content: Dick Sheppard progressed from trials and scrambles to stock car driving. He later turned to stunting. In 1969 he formed "The Disaster Squad" who smashed cars and trucks at hair-raising speeds. In the first performance Dick jumped a speeding car through the first floor wall of the Heanor Boat Inn at Leicester. The latest project is STUNTARAMA with Jacquie de Creed. This organisation is devoted to all aspects of stunting wherever they are required in the world. Dick has visited 24 countries during his stunting career and has appeared on many TV shows. His name has appeared in "The Guinness Book of Records" many times. The latest record is that of having walked away from over 1000 car wrecks.
